transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji boliye madam.
Executive: Sir, good evening. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya, badhiya, aap sunao. Ji sir, main achchi hoon. Sir, woh kal baat hui thi na aapne bola tha ek bar connect karoge regarding concern to woh usi ke liye call kar rahi thi. Sir, hamare pass na ek concern open ho jata hai aapka us feedback ke bihaf pe na. To aap bataye sir kya changes hain?
Executive: Drive kar raha hoon. Actually main abhi drive kar raha hoon to abhi main pahuncha nahi. Pahunch kar phir baat karta hoon aap se.
Executive: Sir, aap kab tak pahunch jayenge?
Customer: Mere ko lagenge abhi kam se kam do ghante.
Executive: Two hours. Sir but hamara 6 baje tak ka rehta hai sir office. Aap 6 baje connect kar sakte hain kya sir?
Customer: Chalo ek bar call kar lijiyega mere ko 6 baje ke aas pass.
Executive: Ji. Theek hai, theek hai done.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive calling regarding a previous concern.

- Wants to know what changes customer wants.



Resolution:

- Customer is driving and will connect later.

- Agreed to connect around 6 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer around 6 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, concern, follow up
